casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Kevin McKenzie DAWKINS. No. 46P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Haakon Thorsen, Charlotte, for Kevin McKenzie Dawkins. John P. Scherer, II, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of January 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
